file.name: openapi.yml
file.content:
openapi: 3.0.1
info:
  title: The Movie Database (TMDB)
  description: |-
    This is a generated connector for [The Movie Database (TMDB) API v3](https://www.themoviedb.org/documentation/api) OpenAPI specification.
    The Movie Database (TMDB) API provide data about movies and tv shows around the world.
  x-ballerina-init-description: >
    The connector initialization requires setting the API credentials.

    Request a [TMDB Account](https://www.themoviedb.org/signup) and obtain tokens following [this guide](https://developers.themoviedb.org/3/getting-started/introduction).
  version: "3"
  x-ballerina-display:
    label: The Movie Database (TMDB)
    iconPath: "icon.png"
servers:
- url: https://api.themoviedb.org/3
paths:
  /movie/popular:
    get:
      summary: Get Popular Movies
      description: Get a list of the current popular movies on TMDB. This list updates
        daily.
      operationId: GET_popular-movies
      x-ballerina-display: 
        label: "Get Popular Movies"
      responses:
        200:
          description: Get popular movies response
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                required:
                  - page
                  - results
                  - total_results
                  - total_pages
                properties:
                  page:
                    type: integer
                    description: Specify which page to query
                  results:
                    type: array
                    items:
                      $ref: '#/components/schemas/movie-list-object'
                    description: Movie List Object
                  total_results:
                    type: integer
                    description: Total number of results
                  total_pages:
                    type: integer
                    description: Total number of pages
        401:
          description: Unauthorized
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  status_message:
                    type: string
                  status_code:
                    type: integer
        404:
          description: Not Found
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  status_message:
                    type: string
                  status_code:
                    type: integer
      security:
      - api_key: []
  /movie/upcoming:
    get:
      summary: Get Upcoming Movies
      description: |-
        Get a list of upcoming movies in theatres. This is a release type query that looks for all movies that have a release type of 2 or 3 within the specified date range.

        You can optionally specify a `region` prameter which will narrow the search to only look for theatrical release dates within the specified country.
      operationId: GET_upcoming-movies
      x-ballerina-display: 
        label: "Get Upcoming Movies"
      responses:
        200:
          description: Get upcoming movies response
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                required:
                  - dates
                  - page
                  - results
                  - total_results
                  - total_pages
                properties:
                  page:
                    type: integer
                    description: Specify which page to query
                  results:
                    type: array
                    items:
                      $ref: '#/components/schemas/movie-list-object'
                    description: Movie List Object
                  dates:
                    type: object
                    description: Release date range of movies
                    $ref: '#/components/schemas/release-date-range'
                  total_pages:
                    type: integer
                    description: Total number of pages
                  total_results:
                    description: Total number of results
        401:
          description: Unauthorized
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  status_message:
                    type: string
                  status_code:
                    type: integer
        404:
          description: Not Found
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  status_message:
                    type: string
                  status_code:
                    type: integer
      security:
      - api_key: []
  /movie/{movie_id}:
    get:
      summary: Get Movie Details
      description: |-
        Get the primary information about a movie.

        Supports `append_to_response`. Read more about this [here](#docTextSection:JdZq8ctmcxNqyLQjp).

        #### Recent Changes

        | **Date** | **Change** |
        | - | - |
        | November 20, 2020 | A `watch/providers` method has been added to show what providers (eg. streaming) are available and where.|
      operationId: GET_movie-by-movie_id
      x-ballerina-display: 
        label: "Get Movie Details"
      parameters:
      - name: movie_id
        in: path
        description: Movie ID
        required: true
        schema:
          type: integer
        x-ballerina-display: 
          label: "Movie ID"
      responses:
        200:
          description: Get movie by movie ID response
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                required:
                  - id
                  - overview
                  - title
                properties:
                  adult:
                    type: boolean
                    description: Adult content or not
                  backdrop_path:
                    type: string
                    description: Backdrop image path
                    nullable: true
                  budget:
                    type: integer
                    description: Budget of movie
                  genres:
                    type: array
                    description: Genres of movie
                    items:
                      type: object
                      $ref: '#/components/schemas/genre'
                  id:
                    type: integer
                    description: Movie ID
                  original_language:
                    type: string
                    description: Original language of movie
                  original_title:
                    type: string
                    description: Original title of movie
                  popularity:
                    type: number
                    description: Popularity of movie
                  poster_path:
                    type: string
                    description: Poster image path
                    nullable: true
                  production_companies:
                    type: array
                    description: Movie production companies
                    items:
                      $ref: '#/components/schemas/production-company'
                  production_countries:
                    type: array
                    description: Countries where movie produced
                    items:
                      $ref: '#/components/schemas/production-country'
                  release_date:
                    type: string
                    format: date
                    description: Release date of movie
                  revenue:
                    type: integer
                    description: Revenue genereted by movie
                  spoken_languages:
                    type: array
                    description: Languages spoken in movie
                    items:
                      $ref: '#/components/schemas/spoken-language'
                  status:
                    type: string
                    description: Status of movie
                    enum:
                    - Rumored
                    - Planned
                    - In Production
                    - Post Production
                    - Released
                    - Canceled
                  title:
                    type: string
                    description: Title of movie
                  video:
                    type: boolean
                    description: Contain videos or not
                  vote_average:
                    type: number
                    description: Vote average
                  vote_count:
                    type: integer
                    description: Vote count
        401:
          description: Unauthorized
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  status_message:
                    type: string
                  status_code:
                    type: integer
        404:
          description: Not Found
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  status_message:
                    type: string
                  status_code:
                    type: integer
      security:
      - api_key: []
  /tv/top_rated:
    get:
      summary: Get Top Rated
      description: Get a list of the top rated TV shows on TMDB
      operationId: GET_top_rated-tv-show
      x-ballerina-display: 
        label: "Get Top Rated TV Shows"
      responses:
        200:
          description: Get top rated TV show response
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                required:
                  - page
                  - results
                  - total_results
                  - total_pages
                properties:
                  page:
                    type: integer
                    description: Specify which page to query
                  results:
                    type: array
                    items:
                      $ref: '#/components/schemas/tv-list-object'
                    description: TV List Object
                  total_results:
                    type: integer
                    description: Total number of results
                  total_pages:
                    type: integer
                    description: Total number of pages
        401:
          description: Unauthorized
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  status_message:
                    type: string
                  status_code:
                    type: integer
        404:
          description: Not Found
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  status_message:
                    type: string
                  status_code:
                    type: integer
      security:
      - api_key: []
  /tv/{tv_id}/season/{season_number}/episode/{episode_number}:
    get:
      summary: Get Details
      description: |-
        Get the TV episode details by id.

        Supports `append_to_response`. Read more about this [here](#docTextSection:JdZq8ctmcxNqyLQjp).

        #### Recent Changes

        | **Date** | **Change** |
        | - | - |
        | June 1, 2018 | Added the [translations](#endpoint:5SFwZar3LkP99QMp7) method. |
      operationId: GET_tv-show-episode
      x-ballerina-display: 
        label: "Get TV Show Episode"
      parameters:
      - name: tv_id
        in: path
        description: TV show ID
        required: true
        schema:
          type: integer
        x-ballerina-display: 
          label: "TV Show ID"
      - name: season_number
        in: path
        description: TV show season number
        required: true
        schema:
          type: integer
        x-ballerina-display: 
          label: "Season Number"
      - name: episode_number
        in: path
        description: TV show episode number
        required: true
        schema:
          type: integer
        x-ballerina-display: 
          label: "Episode Number"
      responses:
        200:
          description: Get TV show by details response
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                required:
                  - crew
                  - id
                  - overview
                  - name
                  - season_number
                  - episode_number
                properties:
                  air_date:
                    type: string
                    format: date
                    description: Air date of TV show
                  crew:
                    type: array
                    description: Crew details of TV show
                    items:
                      $ref: '#/components/schemas/crew'
                  episode_number:
                    type: integer
                    description: Episode number
                  guest_stars:
                    type: array
                    description: Guest stars in TV show
                    items:
                      $ref: '#/components/schemas/guest-star'
                  name:
                    type: string
                    description: Crew details of TV show
                  overview:
                    type: string
                    description: Overview of TV show
                  id:
                    type: integer
                    description: TV show ID
                  season_number:
                    type: integer
                    description: Season number
                  still_path:
                    type: string
                    nullable: true
                    description: Still path
                  vote_average:
                    type: number
                    description: Vote average
                  vote_count:
                    type: integer
                    description: Vote count
        401:
          description: Unauthorized
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  status_message:
                    type: string
                  status_code:
                    type: integer
        404:
          description: Not Found
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  status_message:
                    type: string
                  status_code:
                    type: integer
      security:
      - api_key: []
  /search/movie:
    get:
      summary: Search Movies
      description: Search for movies
      operationId: search-movie
      x-ballerina-display: 
        label: "Search Movies"
      parameters:
      - name: query
        in: query
        description: Text query to search
        required: true
        schema:
          type: string
        x-ballerina-display: 
          label: "Search Text Query"
      - name: year
        in: query
        description: Release year of movie
        schema:
          type: integer
        x-ballerina-display: 
          label: "Movie Release Year"
      responses:
        200:
          description: Search movie response
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                required:
                  - page
                  - results
                  - total_results
                  - total_pages
                properties:
                  page:
                    type: integer
                    description: Specify which page to query
                  results:
                    type: array
                    items:
                      $ref: '#/components/schemas/movie-list-object'
                    description: Movie List Object
                  total_results:
                    type: integer
                    description: Total number of results
                  total_pages:
                    type: integer
                    description: Total number of pages
        401:
          description: Unauthorized
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  status_message:
                    type: string
                  status_code:
                    type: integer
        404:
          description: Not Found
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  status_message:
                    type: string
                  status_code:
                    type: integer
      security:
      - api_key: []
  /search/tv:
    get:
      summary: Search TV Shows
      description: Search for a TV show
      operationId: search-tv-show
      x-ballerina-display: 
        label: "Search TV Shows"
      parameters:
      - name: query
        in: query
        description: Text query to search
        required: true
        schema:
          type: string
        x-ballerina-display: 
          label: "Search Text Query"
      - name: firstAirDateYear
        in: query
        description: First air date
        schema:
          type: integer
        x-ballerina-display: 
          label: "First Air Date"
      responses:
        200:
          description: Search TV show response
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                required:
                  - page
                  - results
                  - total_results
                  - total_pages
                properties:
                  page:
                    type: integer
                    description: Specify which page to query
                  results:
                    type: array
                    items:
                      $ref: '#/components/schemas/tv-list-object'
                    description: TV List Object
                  total_results:
                    type: integer
                    description: Total number of results
                  total_pages:
                    type: integer
                    description: Total number of pages
        401:
          description: Unauthorized
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  status_message:
                    type: string
                  status_code:
                    type: integer
        404:
          description: Not Found
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  status_message:
                    type: string
                  status_code:
                    type: integer
      security:
      - api_key: []
components:
  schemas:
    movie-list-object:
      title: Movie List Object
      type: object
      description: Movie list object
      required:
        - id
        - overview
        - title
      properties:
        poster_path:
          type: string
          description: Poster image path
          nullable: true
        adult:
          type: boolean
          description: Adult content or not
        overview:
          type: string
          description: Overview of movie
        release_date:
          type: string
          description: Release date
        genre_ids:
          type: array
          description: Genre IDs of movie
          items:
            type: integer
        id:
          type: integer
          description: Movie ID
        original_title:
          type: string
          description: Original title
        original_language:
          type: string
          description: Original language
        title:
          type: string
          description: Title of movie
        backdrop_path:
          type: string
          description: Backdrop image path
          nullable: true
        popularity:
          type: number
          description: Popularity of movie 
        vote_count:
          type: integer
          description: Vote count
        video:
          type: boolean
          description: Video available or not
        vote_average:
          type: number
          description: Vote average
    tv-list-object:
      title: TV List Object
      type: object
      description: TV list object
      required:
        - id
        - overview
        - name
      properties:
        poster_path:
          type: string
          description: Poster image path
          nullable: true
        popularity:
          type: number
          description: Popularity of TV show 
        id:
          type: integer
          description: TV show ID
        backdrop_path:
          type: string
          description: Backdrop image path
          nullable: true
        vote_average:
          type: number
          description: Vote average
        overview:
          type: string
          description: Overview of TV show 
        first_air_date:
          type: string
          description: First air date of TV show 
        origin_country:
          type: array
          description: Origin country
          items:
            type: string
        genre_ids:
          type: array
          description: Genre IDs of TV show 
          items:
            type: integer
        original_language:
          type: string
          description: Original language
        vote_count:
          type: integer
          description: Vote count
        name:
          type: string
          description: Name
        original_name:
          type: string
          description: Original name of TV show    
    release-date-range:
      required:
        - maximum
        - minimum
      title: Release Date Range
      type: object
      description: Release date range
      properties:
        maximum:
          type: string
          description: Maximum date of release
        minimum:
          type: string
          description: Minimum date of release
    genre:
      required:
        - name
        - id
      title: Genere Of Movie
      type: object
      description: Genere of movie
      properties:
        id:
          type: integer
          description: Genre ID
        name:
          type: string
          description: Genre name
    production-company:
      required:
        - name
        - id
      title: Production Company
      type: object
      description: Production company
      properties:
        name:
          type: string
          description: Production company name
        id:
          type: integer
          description: Production company ID
        origin_country:
          type: string
          description: Country of production company
          nullable: true
    production-country:
      required:
        - iso_3166_1
        - name
      title: Production Country
      type: object
      description: Production country
      properties:
        iso_3166_1:
          type: string
          description: Standard for representation of country names
        name:
          type: string
          description: Production country name
    spoken-language:
      required:
        - iso_639_1
        - name
      title: Spoken Language
      type: object
      description: Spoken language
      properties:
        iso_639_1:
          type: string
          description: Standard for representation of languages
        name:
          type: string
          description: Spoken language name
    crew:
      required:
        - id
        - name
      title: Crew Details Of TV Show
      type: object
      description: Crew details of TV show
      properties:
        id:
          type: integer
          description: Crew ID
        credit_id:
          type: string
          description: Credit ID of crew
        name:
          type: string
          description: Name of the crew
        department:
          type: string
          description: Crew department
        job:
          type: string
          description: Job of the crew
        profile_path:
          type: string
          description: Profile image path
          nullable: true
    guest-star:
      required:
        - id
        - name
      title: Guest Star Details Of TV Show
      type: object
      description: Guest star details of TV show
      properties:
        id:
          type: integer
          description: Guest star ID
        name:
          type: string
          description: Name of the guest star
        credit_id:
          type: string
          description: Credit ID of guest star
        character:
          type: string
          description: Character of guest star
        order:
          type: string
          description: Order of guest star
        profile_path:
          type: string
          description: Profile image path
          nullable: true
  responses:
    401:
      description: Unauthorized
      content:
        application/json:
          schema:
            type: object
            properties:
              status_code:
                type: integer
              status_message:
                type: string
    404:
      description: Not Found
      content:
        application/json:
          schema:
            type: object
            properties:
              status_message:
                type: string
              status_code:
                type: integer
  parameters:
    session_id:
      name: session_id
      in: query
      required: true
      schema:
        type: string
    guest_session_id:
      name: guest_session_id
      in: query
      schema:
        type: string
  securitySchemes:
    api_key:
      type: apiKey
      description: All requests on the TMDB API needs to include an API key. The API key can be provided as part of the query string or as a request header. The name of the API key needs to be `api_key`
      name: api_key
      in: query
